description:
Showcase of Custom Property-Validators working on a simple property and executed in the cluster.

It will simply check that the entered number is even.

For the Java implementation check out [ExamplePropertyValidatorForSimpleSchema.java](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/settings/monitoring/impl/internalapi/schemas/customvalidation/ExamplePropertyValidatorForSimpleSchema.java)
displayName: Custom Property-Validator on a simple type

constraints.customMessage: This must be an even number
